cardList.front: ¿Qué tal ir a una fiesta? Las fiestas son una forma estupenda de conocer gente nueva. ¿Qué te parece?
cardList.back: Well, I think going to a party might be a good idea. Parties are a great way to meet new people. What do you think?

cardList.back: I agree, but maybe he's not in the mood to socialize. What about going to a concert?

cardList.back: Well, you may be right. Concerts are a great way to enjoy music. And what about going to a bar?

cardList.front: Creo que ir a un club nocturno es mejor, ¿no crees?

cardList.back: Ah, I think so, too. Nightclubs are very fun. And, honestly, if he's tired he won't want to stay at home. What do you think?

cardList.back: Of course not. And playing video games, I believe it's boring and not very social, so in my opinion the best option is going to a nightclub. Do you agree?

cardList.back: I completely agree with you. It's a good way to have fun with friends.
